verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid, of David מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm חֶֽסֶד־ <WH2617> che-sed- of mercy וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> u-mish-Pat and judgment אָשִׁ֑ירָה <WH7891> 'a-Shi-rah; I will sing לְךָ֖ le-Cha יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto thee O LORD אֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ <WH2167> 'a-zam-Me-rah. will I sing

אַשְׂכִּ֤ילָה׀ <WH7919> 'as-Ki-lah I will behave myself wisely בְּדֶ֬רֶךְ <WH1870> be-De-rech way תָּמִ֗ים <WH8549> ta-Mim, in a perfect מָ֭תַי <WH4970> Ma-tai When תָּב֣וֹא <WH935> ta-Vo O when wilt thou come אֵלָ֑י <WH413> 'e-Lai; to me אֶתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> 'et-hal-Lech unto me;I will walk בְּתָם־ <WH8537> be-tom- with a perfect לְ֝בָבִ֗י <WH3824> le-va-Vi, heart בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> be-Ke-rev within בֵּיתִֽי׃ <WH1004> bei-Ti. my house

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- no אָשִׁ֨ית׀ <WH7896> 'a-Shit I will set לְנֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> le-Ne-ged before עֵינַ֗י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai, before mine eyes דְּֽבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- thing בְּלִ֫יָּ֥עַל <WH1100> be-Li-Ya-'al no wicked עֲשֹֽׂה־ <WH6213> 'a-soh- the work סֵטִ֥ים <WH7750> se-Tim of them that turn aside שָׂנֵ֑אתִי <WH8130> sa-Ne-ti; I hate לֹ֖א <WH3808> lo no יִדְבַּ֣ק <WH1692> yid-Bak [it] shall not cleave בִּֽי׃ Bi.

לֵבָ֣ב <WH3824> le-Vav heart עִ֭קֵּשׁ <WH6141> 'Ik-kesh A froward יָס֣וּר <WH5493> ya-Sur shall depart מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> mi-Men-ni; at רָ֝֗ע <WH7451> Ra', a wicked לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo no אֵדָֽע׃ <WH3045> 'e-Da'. from me I will not know

מְלֹושְׁנִי me-lo-she-ni כמְלָשְׁנִ֬י <WH3960> me-la-she-Ni accuse קבַסֵּ֨תֶר׀ <WH5643> vas-Se-ter Whoso privily רֵעֵהוּ֮ <WH7453> re-'e-Hu his neighbour אוֹת֪וֹ <WH853> o-To אַ֫צְמִ֥ית <WH6789> 'atz-Mit him will I cut off גְּֽבַהּ־ <WH1362> ge-vah- him that hath an high עֵ֭ינַיִם <WH5869> 'Ei-na-yim look וּרְחַ֣ב <WH7342> u-re-Chav and a proud לֵבָ֑ב <WH3824> le-Vav; heart אֹ֝ת֗וֹ <WH853> o-To, לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo No אוּכָֽל׃ <WH3201> 'u-Chal. will not I suffer

עֵינַ֤י׀ <WH5869> 'ei-Nai Mine eyes בְּנֶֽאֶמְנֵי־ <WH539> be-ne-'em-nei- [shall be] upon the faithful אֶרֶץ֮ <WH776> 'e-Retz of the land לָשֶׁ֪בֶת <WH3427> la-She-vet that they may dwell עִמָּ֫דִ֥י <WH5978> 'im-Ma-Di who הֹ֭לֵךְ <WH1980> Ho-lech with me he that walketh בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> be-De-rech way תָּמִ֑ים <WH8549> ta-Mim; in a perfect ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> Hu, is the one יְשָׁרְתֵֽנִי׃ <WH8334> ye-sha-re-Te-ni. he shall serve

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not יֵשֵׁ֨ב׀ <WH3427> ye-Shev shall not dwell בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> be-Ke-rev within בֵּיתִי֮ <WH1004> bei-Ti my house עֹשֵׂ֪ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh He that worketh רְמִ֫יָּ֥ה <WH7423> re-Mi-Yah deceit דֹּבֵ֥ר <WH1696> do-Ver he that telleth שְׁקָרִ֑ים <WH8267> she-ka-Rim; lies לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not יִ֝כּ֗וֹן <WH3559> yik-Kon, shall not tarry לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> le-Ne-ged before עֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> 'ei-Nai. in my sight

לַבְּקָרִ֗ים <WH1242> lab-be-ka-Rim, I will early אַצְמִ֥ית <WH6789> 'atz-Mit destroy כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all רִשְׁעֵי־ <WH7563> rish-'ei- all the wicked אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz; of the land לְהַכְרִ֥ית <WH3772> le-hach-Rit that I may cut off מֵֽעִיר־ <WH5892> me-'ir- from the city יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> Po-'a-lei doers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> 'A-ven. all wicked
